text:
[Verse]
Dancing in the rain
Feel the drops again
Feet in puddles play
Let the storm stay

[Verse]
Laughing with the wind
Smiles never thin
Spinning in the street
Find the upbeat

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Lose our grip on pain
Jump and twirl around
Happiness found

[Verse]
Skies are turning grey
We won't run away
In the storm we'll bloom
Sweep away the gloom

[Bridge]
With every splash we sing
Joy it won't be fleeting
Raindrops on our skin
Happiness within

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Lose our grip on pain
Jump and twirl around
Happiness found
title: Dancing in the Rain
